Incredible meal!We yelped this restaurant and it had good reviews so we set out and walked there.  Great part of town and the restaurant itself is very nicely decorated.  Modern on one side and traditional on the the other.  We had the octopus with truffle sauce and it was "to die for"!!!!!! Everything was great there.  The service was exceptional as well.  We met one of the owners, Maria, and she was very nice and even spent time with us to tell us other places to go.  I would highly recommend this place!!!!!!
